commit_scope: Add agent graph-state schema contract and transition validation with actionable diagnostics, plus integration tests for persisted schema and invalid-state error reporting.

commands: cd api && pytest -v tests/test_agent_integration_api.py tests/test_agent_executor_policy.py tests/test_agent_usage_tracking_api.py

phase_gate.blocked_reason: Awaiting push, PR checks, merge, and public deploy verification.

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: Each task now carries an explicit graph-state schema contract and validation status to support deterministic orchestration diagnostics.
test_flows: Create task and verify context.agent_graph_state_schema + required fields.
Patch malformed agent_graph_state and verify actionable validation errors in task context.
